values.value:
You've now been provisioned in CATS (Woolworths' timesheet and financial cross-charging system). As part of your engagement at Woolworths, you will need to complete a weekly timesheet via CATS. Your Woolworths line or project manager can assist with getting you started.

1. Review this knowledge article for further information
2. Speak to your line or project manager to obtain your project and/or cost centre number as well as answer any further queries you may have
3. Please mark this task as done
